org.lenskit.data.ratings

Class RatingBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.data.entities.EntityBuilder
      • org.lenskit.data.ratings.RatingBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder<Rating>, EventBuilder<Rating>

    public class RatingBuilder
extends EntityBuilder
implements EventBuilder<Rating>, org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder<Rating>, Cloneable

    Build a Rating.

    Since:
    1.3

      • setRating

        public RatingBuilder setRating(double r)

        Set the rating value.

        In order to prevent computation errors from producing unintended unrate events, this method cannot be used to create an unrate event. Instead, use clearRating().

        Parameters:
        r - The rating value.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

      • clearRating

        public RatingBuilder clearRating()

        Clear the rating value (so this builder builds unrate events).

        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

      • hasRating

        public boolean hasRating()

        Query whether this builder has a rating.

        Returns:
        true if the builder has a rating, false if it will produce unrate events.
